title: Trump Tax
tax: #js_moment##js_numeral##js_calc##js_output#
explanation: This is a rough up to the moment total of what tax payers are paying for Donald Trump's personal life: security for his New York City home, vacations, travel for his grown children, and more.
footer: For more information visit trumptax.me
js_calc: <script>var baseline = 3000000 + 98000; var nycCostPerYear = 1000000.00 * 365; var msPerYear = 31536000000; var nycCostPerMs = nycCostPerYear / msPerYear; var trumpStartDate  = moment('Jan 20 2017 09:00:00 EST'); var now = moment([]); var elapsedTime = now.diff(trumpStartDate, 'milliseconds'); var valueAtBoot = (elapsedTime * nycCostPerMs) + baseline; var output = numeral(valueAtBoot).format('0,0.00'); var day = now.diff(trumpStartDate, 'days'); var today = now.format('MM/DD/YYYY');</script>
